attributes.action: TAKE NO ACTION OVER THE SYRIA PHOTOS without putting ABSOLUTE, UNEQUIVOCAL, IRREFUTABLE proof that they are genuine, in the public domain first.
attributes.additional_details: We know to our cost that the WORD of judges and politicians SIMPLY CANNOT be trusted in today's world.  Our government MUST NOT make any commitment AT ALL based on what could be faked photographs and members of the international judiciary who are more than likely to have their own hidden agenda.
